Headline: #192 U. of Chicago Hospitals Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near  Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: SB 192 U. of Chicago Hospitals Exp. buses temp. rerouted: Clinton, Roosevelt, Wabash, Cermak, State, 25th, I-55, and Outer Lake Shore Dr nr Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #192 U. of Chicago Hospitals Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Roosevelt, Wabash, Cermak, State, 25th, I-55, and Outer Lake Shore Drive near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses temp. rerouted EB: Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash; WB: Wabash and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Michigan, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash.

Westbound buses will operate via Wabash and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.
